pros:
Can steal skills from Explorer classes
  • Makes for a versatile and very useful class
Has a revive
Has a useful Link Skill that provides additional %Crit Chance
Has quite a few mobility skills like Shroud Walk, Rapier Wit and Penombre
cons:
Skills have low base damage but damage is consistent
  • Compensated by utility and attacks quick
  • Base damage as in damage per hit on a skill
    • For example, Mille Aiguilles deals 112% damage (at Max Level) but hits 3 times and super quickly

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives and buffs with cooldowns
Dodge Chance: 50%
Crit Rate: +35% + (up to 20% from Link Skill)
Ignore DEF: +30% + (20% from Penombre debuff)

details: Put one SP into each skill first
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level 20 & 30

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Tempest - Reinforce and Cooldown Cutter
  • Mille Aiguilles - Reinforce and Guardbreak
  • Choice of:
    • Tempest - Extra Target
    • Mille Aiguilles - Extra Target
    • Bad Luck Ward - Immunity Enhance

primary.desc: Allows you to teleport using the directional keys up to 3 times
details: Cooldown increases based on the number of times you teleported (by 1.5 secs each)

primary.desc: Activates a special UI where you can select and steal skills from nearby Explorer characters
details: Passive effects of stolen skills will not be applied

Skill duration and cooldowns will be the same for Phantom
  • Certain skills may not be stolen and Bishop's Heal's cooldown, if stolen will be longer

primary.desc: Releases all the cards in your Card Gauge which seek out and attack one enemy
details:
Phantom has a special gauge that is charged by attacking enemies
  • Once it is full you may use this skill to reset your gauge

You also gain a buff after this skill has been activated:
  • [Destin]: Increases %Crit Rate
  • [Malheur]: Increases %Item Drop Rate
  • [Endurance]: Increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
  • [Drain]: Restore some %Max HP when attacking

primary.desc: When this skill is on Auto, will automatically be used when your Card Gauge is filled
Strikes forward twice
Allows you to use a stolen 1st Job Explorer skill
Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot using or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used twice in a row
[Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed, Jump and Max Movement Speed

primary.desc: Sends out cards that strike forward
Allows you to use a stolen 2nd Job Explorer skill
Launches a blast of cards that pushes enemies back
When you land a critical hit, there is a chance to create a card that seek and attack a nearby enemy
Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Slices up enemies in front of you
When hit by a fatal attack, you will not die but instead heal back a percentage of your HP back
details: You are briefly invincible after reviving
Not affected by cooldown resets
[Passive]: Permanently grants flat LUK

primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks
Dashes forward and then strikes forward
details: Can be linked with to reduce post-attack delay
[Passive]: Increases %Damage of

primary.desc: When held, rapidly fires in front of you hitting only one enemy
details: You can move while casting
[Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of

primary.desc: Leap up into the air and rain down spears on enemies while debuffing them
details: [Debuff]: Decreases %Defence and makes all attacks towards that enemy critical hits
[Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of
Using link skills (combos) will reduce the cooldown by 1 sec

primary.desc: Dashes forward while damaging enemies you pass through
details: Increases the %Damage of
Debuffs bosses causing them to take increased %Damage from Ishtar's Ring

This attack can be linked when used first with:
  • Rising Rush (2nd job)
  • Stunning Strikes (3rd job)
  • Unicorn Spike (3rd job)
  • Spikes Royale (4th job)
  • Wrath of Enlil (Hyper Skill)

Using a non-macroed during the animation of Lightning Edge removes the end delay allowing you to move immediately afterwards
  • Allows Lightning Edge to be spammed
  • If you cannot get it to work, try spamming both and Lightning Edge together until you get the hang of it

primary.desc: While in the air, spin and deal damage to nearby enemies
details: Resets , allowing it to be used again
Can be used without
Another way to activate Rolling Moonsault is to press the Down Arrow Key and Attack key during Rishing Rush's launch attack
Using Rolling Moonsault after grants additional airborne height compared to using it on its own

This attack can be linked when used first with:
  • Leaf Tornado (3rd job)
  • Gust Dive (3rd job)
  • Spikes Royale (4th job)
  • Wrath of Enlil (Hyper Skill)
[Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of and

primary.desc: While attacking in the air, you can cancel the skill and animation with this . To activate, click on the Arrow Key direction you want to dash to and
details:
Can be used mid-dash during and
  • Keeps momentum of original skill, allowing for some interesting movement

primary.desc: Enhances the %Damage of and also turns the arrows red
Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

hyperPassive.desc: Increases the passive %Damage increase to

hyperActive.desc: Unleashes an attack in front of you
details:
This attack can be linked when used first with:
  • Rising Rush (2nd job)
  • Stunning Strikes (3rd job)
  • Unicorn Spike (3rd job)
  • Spikes Royale (4th job)
  • Lightning Edge (4th job)
Using link skills (combos) will reduce the cooldown by 1 sec

fifthMain.name: Spirit of Elluel
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 65 sec, your afterimages may mimic the skills you use up to 3 time each
Afterimage Final Damage: 55%
Afterimage Skill Mimic Chance: 90% (-20% per successful mimic)
Ishtar's Ring Activation Chance: 50%Spirits - deal 825% damage 8 times on up to 10 enemies for 10 sec, cooldown decreases by 1 sec after using a linked skill
Cooldown: 150 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, attacks have a chance to create afterimages that mimic your skills. Additioanlly, periodically a giant tree appears that deals damage to enemies
details: The giant tree has a cooldown (10 secs) but using link skills (combos) will reduce the cooldown by 1 sec

fifthMain.name: Sylvidia's Flight
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Mount Duration: 42 sec. Knockback Resistance: +100%, Attack Power: +17%, Damage Taken: -25% (Includes HP% Based Attacks)\nDash attack deals 1300% damage to up to 12 enemies 9 times.\nCooldown: 150 sec
fifthMain.desc: Mount onto Sylvidia and dash through enemies
details: Pressing first will mount onto Sylvidia and during the duration of the mount, you can press again to perform a dash attack

Sylvidia's attacks can also be triggered by pressing the Jump Key in midair
  • If you hold the Up arrow key while pressing , you will dash upwards diagonally
You receive max stacks of while riding
During the duration of the skill, you gain %Attack, %Damage Reduction and 100% Knockback Resistance
While riding, only certain skills can be used: , , ,, ,, , , , and

fifthMain.name: Irkalla's Wrath
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, can press the key down for up to 8.5 sec, attacks up to 10 enemies in front of you to deal 800% damage 8 times consecutively.\nYou can use it while walking backward and can change direction by pressing the direction key twice\nCooldown: 150 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a flurry of arrows similar to for up to 8.5 secs but can hit multiple enemies
details:
While the skill is active, you can move but only walk backwards
  • To change directions, press the Arrow Key of the direction you want to face twice

meta: Phantom is LUK thief class part of the Heroes class group. What makes Phantoms unique is their ability to steal and use the Skills Explorer classes except for Zen/Jett
